attributes.action: Apply a road Tax on commercial vehicles (H.G.V.)visiting  from the continent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Uk Commercial vehicles pay over £3000 a year for road tax, 
When the UK commercial vehicle goes Abroad it has to pay additional road tax.
Benulux countrys have a daily duty road tax that must be bought before they enter the country, this tax is only for commercial (H.G.V.), France,Italy,Spain use road tolls which applies to every vehicle (motorways).

The Continental Commercial vehicle does NOT.
They arrive in the UK with full tanks of fuel,enough fuel to get them in and out of the Uk without buying any, also they can drive 24/7, In france,Italy there is no commercial driving allowed between the hours of 10.00pm saturday and 10.00 pm sunday also bank holidays unless they are exempt, Emergency vehicles,livestock,fresh produce.

Apply a road tax to commercial vehicles who vist the Uk and a limit on the ammount of fuel so that they have to buy British fuel!, put the same ban on weekend driving/bank holidays for all commercial vehicles, emergency, fresh produce, and livestock exempt.
